DOC.brief_title: Vinorelbine Plus Capecitabine Versus Docetaxel Plus Capecitabine Anthracycline-pretreated Women With Metastatic Breast Cancer
DOC.detailed_description: A randomise control trial vinorelbine plus capecitabine versus docetaxel plus capecitabine anthracycline-pretreated woman metastatic breast cancer . The primary endpoint study progression free survival ( PFS ) . The secondary endpoint overall response rate ( ORR ) , overall survival ( OS ) safety .
